title: OpenAI has opened the floodgates for ChatGPT to make previously banned images
body: Upon request, ChatGPT will now make images of public figures, hateful symbols, and potentially controversial posts

title: OpenAI responds to criticism of ChatGPT's Studio Ghibli-style images
body: After ChatGPT-generated images in the style of Studio Ghibli drew criticism online, OpenAI has shared a response addressing the backlash.
